revised_title: Derivation of Maxwellian Equations and the Relationship between Material and Radiational Waves
tldr: The authors derive the Maxwellian equations of electromagnetic and electron theory from a set of basic relations, shedding light on the relationship between material and radiational waves. They identify three types of physical entities: positive electricity, negative electricity, and radiation. The study shows that a physical entity can be associated with the propagation of a vector A in a specific direction, leading to the existence of matter and radiation.
